item.title: Migrate Openvz To Lxc
item.description: I recently had to migrate containers from a proxmox3 (under OpenVZ) to a proxmox4 (under LXC). Problem, there are a lot of containers to migrate/“convert” to run under LXC. So I needed a way to automate the procedure as much as possible. Luckily, the migration documentation is very well detailed. So I used it to “bash” the operation. You can find all the sources on my github I cut the operation under two scripts, an export script and an import script.
